summary:
Adds a Skyforge marker to your map. Gods be praised, now you can fast travel directly to the oldest and most powerful forge in Skyrim. Like other map markers, the location must first be discovered before it will appear on your map. 

It will not work if you are using an \"Open Cities\" mod.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a Skyforge marker to your map. Gods be praised, now you can fast travel directly to the oldest and most powerful forge in Skyrim. Like other map markers, the location must first be discovered before it will appear on your map. 

It will not work if you are using an \"Open Cities\" mod.
==================================================
This Mod is Created by \"Jayschwa\" And the Original Mod Is available on Steam Workshop: 
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=10173
==================================================
author: KennyBall
